Name: Smokin Rose
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
5 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: A Daiquiri riff with Islay malt, rose petal liqueur and vanilla.
History: Created in 2008 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Smokin Rose contains 193 calories
